animal.name: Holstein Cow
animal.description: Black-and-white dairy cows known for their high milk production.

animal.name: Beagle
animal.description: Small to medium-sized dogs known for their friendly nature and strong sense of smell.

animal.name: Persian Cat
animal.description: Long-haired cats with a sweet, calm temperament and a love for lounging.

animal.name: Bengal Cat
animal.description: Wild-looking cats with a striking coat, very active and playful.

animal.name: Flamingo
animal.description: Elegant wading birds known for their long legs and striking pink feathers.

animal.name: Wolf
animal.description: Large, wild canines that live in packs and have a close-knit social structure.

animal.name: Ragdoll
animal.description: Large, gentle cats that go limp when picked up, making them easy to handle.

animal.name: German Shepherd
animal.description: Smart, versatile, and highly trainable dogs, often used as working dogs.

animal.name: Scottish Fold
animal.description: Distinctive cats with folded ears and a sweet, calm personality.

animal.name: Golden Retriever
animal.description: Friendly, reliable, and well-known for their loyalty and intelligence.

animal.name: Hummingbird
animal.description: Small, vibrant birds known for their ability to hover and fly backward.

animal.name: Bald Eagle
animal.description: Powerful birds of prey with white heads and tails, known as a symbol of the United States.

animal.name: Hereford Cow
animal.description: A breed of cattle known for their high-quality beef and distinctive white faces.

animal.name: Jersey Cow
animal.description: A small breed of dairy cattle, known for their high butterfat content in milk.

animal.name: Labrador Retriever
animal.description: Friendly, outgoing, and high-energy dogs, excellent as family pets.

animal.name: Peacock
animal.description: Male peafowls with an impressive tail, famous for their colorful feathers.
